document_notes.text:
This update for glibc fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-33574: Fixed a use-after-free possibility in mq_notify() (bsc#1186489)

notes.text: The mq_notify function in the GNU C Library (aka glibc) versions 2.32 and 2.33 has a use-after-free. It may use the notification thread attributes object (passed through its struct sigevent parameter) after it has been freed by the caller, leading to a denial of service (application crash) or possibly unspecified other impact.
